skill.name: Bond
skill.description: Warrior shares half of the damage dealt to an ally. Lasts 8 turns.  Prevents assassination by the Rogue.

skill.name: Strong Arm
skill.description: Warrior increases strength of an ally. Lasts 18 turns.

skill.name: Bloody Strike
skill.description: A large laceration that causes one enemy to bleed health over 3 turns.

skill.name: Armor Break
skill.description: An armor breaking slash that reduces an enemy's armor for 12 turns.

skill.name: Heavy Strike
skill.description: An all in attack on one enemy that is heavily reliant on the Warrior's strength.

skill.name: Spike Aura
skill.description: All physical attacks on Warrior will reflect damage dealt. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Shield Aura
skill.description: An aura that increases the armor of all allies. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Critical Aura
skill.description: An aura to increase critical strike chance. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Shield Wall
skill.description: Invincibility lies in the defense; the possibility of victory in the attack. All allies are immune to damage for 6 turns.

skill.name: Dual Edge
skill.description: You have a choice. Live or die. Just make sure you take somebody down with you.

skill.name: Open Wounds
skill.description: Tears open old wounds. Deals extra damage for each effect. Removes all effects on successful attacks.

skill.name: Multi Thrust
skill.description: A flurry of three blows dealt in quick succession on an enemy.

skill.name: Heal
skill.description: Replenish a portion of an ally's health.

skill.name: Pinpoint Strike
skill.description: Your weapons sink deep into the flesh of an enemy. Chance of a critical strike increased.

skill.name: Rust
skill.description: A ball of armor-melting dust is thrown onto one enemy.

skill.name: Bubble Burst
skill.description: A sharp thrust that pokes a hole in one enemy's mana storage.

skill.name: Weaken
skill.description: Crazy powder is thrown at one enemy, reducing strength and agility for 6 turns.

skill.name: Blood Poison
skill.description: Infected blood seeps under one enemy's skin, dealing damage for 7 turns.

skill.name: Quick Poison
skill.description: Weapon's dipped in this poison will increase damage dealt. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Infection
skill.description: Infected wounds will allow poisons to do more damage.

skill.name: Mana Leak
skill.description: Power leaks from one enemy, reducing total mana over 4 turns.

skill.name: Precision Shot
skill.description: A well placed arrow that strikes the heart of one enemy.

skill.name: Shadow Step
skill.description: Doubles the dodging ability of one ally for 12 turns.

skill.name: Ethereal
skill.description: The Archer enters a trance, increasing intelligence but disabling ranged abilities. Lasts 13 turns.

skill.name: Bandage
skill.description: Replenish a portion of an ally's health points.

skill.name: Rejuvenate
skill.description: Replenish a portion of an ally's health per turn. Lasts 6 turns.

skill.name: Revivify
skill.description: Replenish a portion of health for all allies.

skill.name: Pray
skill.description: A ball of light that circles one ally. Any healing will increase by half. Lasts 14 turns.

skill.name: Enlighten
skill.description: Increases an ally's intelligence. Lasts 15 turns.

skill.name: Holy Snap
skill.description: A spark of holy light that deals damage to all enemies.

skill.name: Mystify
skill.description: Cause confusion and decrease intelligence. The enemy will hurt itself for 6 turns.

skill.name: Prayer of Shield
skill.description: The Healer continuously regenerates health points every turn. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Mend Wound
skill.description: The Archer uses survival skills to remove all negative skill effects from one ally.

skill.name: Death Bolt
skill.description: A shadowy ball of magic that heals you for dealing damage on an enemy.

skill.name: Blood Tap
skill.description: Suck away an enemy's health and give it to yourself. Lasts 5 turns.

skill.name: Dispel
skill.description: Removes all non-permanent positive effects from an enemy.

skill.name: Lingering Fear
skill.description: Fear strikes the heart of one enemy, dealing damage over time. Lasts 12 turns.

skill.name: Blood Spikes
skill.description: Reflect half of the next attack on the Mage back to the enemy. Lasts 19 turns.

skill.name: Curse of Magic
skill.description: An eerie shadow lingers. Health is sucked from all enemies who cast a spell. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Thunderbolt
skill.description: A shock of electricity that damages all enemies.

skill.name: Fireball
skill.description: A ball of flame that burns one enemy for 3 turns.

skill.name: Ice Bolt
skill.description: A bolt of ice that reduces strength and agility for 12 turns.

skill.name: Explosive Shot
skill.description: Launch an explosive arrow which increases subsequent damage. Lasts 9 turns.

skill.name: Wolf Cry
skill.description: A cry to the wild. Increases healing on all allies for 13 turns.

skill.name: Redemption
skill.description: The greatest honor in battle is achieved through sacrifice. Only this time your life force revives allies.

skill.name: Attack
skill.description: A basic combat manuever with no mana cost.

skill.name: Defend
skill.description: Damage dealt to you will be reduced for 8 turns.

skill.name: Attack
skill.description: A basic combat manuever with no mana cost.

skill.name: Attack
skill.description: A basic combat manuever with no mana cost.

skill.name: Attack
skill.description: A basic combat manuever with no mana cost.

skill.name: Blood Poison Effect
skill.description: Blood Poison Effect.

skill.name: Quick Poison Effect
skill.description: Quick Poison Effect.

skill.name: Defend
skill.description: Damage dealt to you will be reduced for 8 turns.

skill.name: Defend
skill.description: Damage dealt to you will be reduced for 8 turns.

skill.name: Defend
skill.description: Damage dealt to you will be reduced for 8 turns.

skill.name: Defend
skill.description: Damage dealt to you will be reduced for 8 turns.

skill.name: Assassinate
skill.description: as·sas·si·nate -verb: To murder premeditatedly and treacherously. Instantly kills targets under half health.

skill.name: Shatter
skill.description: Shattering the enemy's defense shatters their morale, will, and strength. Lasts 6 turns.

skill.name: Feedback
skill.description: You provoked me, you unleashed the beast! All enemy spells are reflected. Lasts 6 turns.

skill.name: Power Shot
skill.description: Don't worry, this won't hurt a bit...

skill.name: Rain Dance
skill.description: Have you seen it? The eternal Dove of healing! All allies will regenerate a portion of their health over 6 turns.

skill.name: Godhand
skill.description: O Gods of Idonia, lend me your power, help me heal in the face of battle! Completely restores health of an ally.

skill.name: Empower
skill.description: Focus on salvation as well as physical healing. Restores half of an ally's mana.

skill.name: Blasphemy
skill.description: All Enemies will have healing spells deal damage instead.

skill.name: Berserk
skill.description: Blind rage increases strength and damage taken. Heals for a small amount.

skill.name: Rain of Arrows
skill.description: A shadow descends upon the land as the sky is filled with arrows.

skill.name: Summon Dove
skill.description: A blessing from a dove increases healing for all allies. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Summon Falcon
skill.description: An agile falcon will boost agility for all allies. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Rally
skill.description: We must all band together, or assuredly we shall all hang separately.

skill.name: Prayer of Power
skill.description: All allies will have a boost to strength and intelligence. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Curse of Haunting
skill.description: The mage will haunt all enemies, reducing all non-primary stats by a small amount. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Attack
skill.description: A basic combat manuever with no mana cost.

skill.name: Prayer of Focus
skill.description: The Healer surges with magical energy. Mana regeneration is increased for all allies. (Passive Effect)

skill.name: Whirlwind
skill.description: They sowed the wind and now they are going to reap the wrath.

skill.name: Piercing Volley
skill.description: A volley that pierces all enemies, causing them to bleed for 3 turns.

skill.name: Arcane Bolt
skill.description: An eerie bolt that deals damage and silences an enemy for 6 turns. This skill only works in the Colosseum.

skill.name: Silence
skill.description: Enemies wil not be able to cast any magical spells for 6 turns. This skill only works in the Colosseum.
